description._content: Catalog #: 09_01644 Title: First Lieutenant Harry Haw Special Collection Photo Grand Canyon Arizona Additional Information: Handwritten inscription ""Curtiss Condor bomber aircraft of the 11th Squadron lined up at the Grand Canyon Airport about 18 miles south of the canyon rim. These are the planes in which I made the trip to the canyon in July 1931"", Harry Haw served in the U.S. Army in the 514th Observation Squadron. He entered the U.S. Army in 1917 and became a First Lieutenant in 1930. He became a civilian Transport Pilot by 1930 and had logged 789 flying hours by 1934. he later became Principal of the Alice Birney school.
